thread.title: Patricia Valerie Hale (Valerie)
thread.title_full: e-Careers reviewed by Patricia Valerie Hale (Valerie)

author: Patricia Valerie Hale (Valerie)
title: Patricia Valerie Hale (Valerie)
text:
I found this course very easy to follow and particularly liked the fact that I could go over something as many times as I wanted to for greater understanding.
I have recommended to friends and bought some courses as Christmas gifts, which have been greatly appreciated.
